snippet: The Brazilian company Vale, the world’s biggest iron ore producer, said it had begun testing equipment at its largest mine, in the Brazilian Amazon.
abstract: Vale announces it has started testing equipment at its largest iron mine, in Brazilian Amazon.
lead_paragraph: The Brazilian company Vale, the world’s biggest iron ore producer, said it had begun testing equipment at its largest mine, in the Brazilian Amazon.

headline.main: Iron Ore Giant Vale Begins Tests at Its Largest Mine
headline.print_headline: Business Briefing; Iron Ore Giant Begins Tests at Its Largest Mine
